text_block_list.text: Suzuka…?!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Haa… haa… a dream…?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
[Takarazuka Kinen] was coming up soon - Silence Suzuka was 
diligently training in preparation for that grand stage.

Hyaaa~, such amazing speed right from the start! 
As always, Suzuka's running is awesome…!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Something that nobody can replicate, that Uma Musume can only 
call a dream-like run…! I get excited just from watching!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Right at the start, Silence Suzuka surged forward at top speed.

With speed almost as if the goal was right infront of her, 
even if the goal was still further ahead.

Normally, around here your speed would start to falter… but in 
Suzuka-san's case, it's just the beginning!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
At that, Silence Suzuka strongly kicked 
at the ground, accelerating.
Fuwaaa~! She just keeps increasing her speed!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
It's almost as if Silence Suzuka is showing that dream-like run 
to excite the fans, the Uma Musume, and even herself.

Every time she runs, Silence Suzuka just keeps improving. 
At this rate, how far will she be able to go?

The running-style you two are aiming for is a big unknown. 
It is possible that it might be something outside the 
limits of what an Uma Musume can do.
text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon

text_block_list.text: In that case, at that time her legs…
text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon

text_block_list.text: Suzuka…?!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: W-what's wrong, Trainer-san?
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Eh… uh. 
No, it's nothing…
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Eh… uh. 
No, it's nothing…
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Haa… Fuu…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Welcome back, Suzuka-san! 
You've updated your time again!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I could kind of tell while I was running. 
It felt like there was a bit more resistance.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
If it's like this, [Takarazuka Kinen] is a definite win! 
Isn't that right, Trainer-san?
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: …Ah, yeah… that's right.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: …Ah, yeah… that's right.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Ever since the day that Agnes Tachyon spoke 
with me, I'd been searching through documents 
regarding other Uma Musumes' injuries.

What conditions were present when they occurred. And when they 
occurred, what kind of situation awaited-

Even though I was trying to do this to drive away my unease, the 
more and more I investigated, the more my uneasiness grew.

(Subject 1. Overwhelming Debut victory. 
Highly anticipated second race.)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(With perfect timing, uncharacteristic of a recent Debut, 
rushed forward on the final straight.)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(Next moment, tumbled to the ground. Disqualified. Leg unable to 
endure exerted force. Fracture. - Forced retirement.)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(Subject 2, Senior Class top performer. Attempting 
to extend Consecutive Major victories. Final corner, 
outside, accelerating at high speed.)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(Mid-corner, sudden slowdown. 
Unable to continue to goal.)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: (Disqualified due to injury. - Unable to fully recover…)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(Even after all these other incidents, there are still 
innumerable documents containing these bitter feelings…)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(That means that for Uma Musume, injuries 
are an ever-present worry…)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(That means that for Uma Musume, injuries 
are an ever-present worry…)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Pardon me.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Suzuka…?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Dinner time had ended at this point, 
but Silence Suzuka came in still dressed in her jersey.

She's probably planning to do more independent 
training. To continue polishing her running style… 
to increase her speed even more.

Um, Trainer-san… lately, 
it seems like you've been staying late and working…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Could it be, there's some kind of problem with my running? 
As things are, will I be unable to win [Takarazuka Kinen]…?
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
(No, you're wrong… the way you are now, you'll 
definitely win [Takarazuka Kinen]. If anything, it's 
more like there's no race you can't win)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(No, you're wrong… the way you are now, you'll 
definitely win [Takarazuka Kinen]. If anything, it's 
more like there's no race you can't win)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(I want to tell her that her running is so overpowering, she'll 
definitely win. But it might be so overwhelming, that I…)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(I want to tell her that her running is so overpowering, she'll 
definitely win. But it might be so overwhelming, that I…)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Yes…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Silence Suzuka cast an anxious glance at me.

To chase her dream, she took the risk of transferring to this 
team, and since she's come here, Silence Suzuka can finally see 
her dream starting to materialize.

I shouldn't try to stop this girl so earnestly chasing her dream, 
but my mind is so hazy, I'm unable to even answer her properly.

Well… there's not really any important reason for it. That 
aside, you've got a race coming up… there's nothing wrong with 
your legs and body, right?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Well… there's not really any important reason for it. That 
aside, you've got a race coming up… there's nothing wrong with 
your legs and body, right?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Am I pushing myself too hard, is that what you're asking…?
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
If that's the case, I'm fine. 
It's right before a race, after all. I'm being very careful.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
On top of that, I'm still feeling very fulfilled. 
There's absolutely nothing that's causing me any worry.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Because, I have-
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka looked like she wanted to say more. Her expression 
was very soft, and there was no sign of any uneasiness at all.

Nevermind… well then, I'll be off to do some independent 
training. Trainer-san don't push yourself too hard either.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, at [Takarazuka Kinen], 
let's see that "scenery" together.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: The "scenery" I'm chasing together with Silence Suzuka-

[Takarazuka Kinen]. What "scenery" will she see there, 
and what "scenery" will she show me?

[Takarazuka Kinen]. What "scenery" will she see there, 
and what "scenery" will she show me?
Will it be crossing the goal with an amazing time recorded?

Or will it be the powerful sight of her never giving 
the lead to any of those strong opponents-

Silence Suzuka runs in the lead! 
Now she's heading around behind the big Zelkova tree!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: (No! That "scenery", I absolutely refuse to let that happen!!)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(I need to search through even more documents. At the 
very least, identify this premonition, and in the worst 
case, at that time just have her stop-)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Thinking that, I once again glance at those documents but-
Huh…? My vision is…
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Huh…? My vision is…
text_block_list.name: <username>
